name: Louis Phaethon Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: John from Glasgow.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the hotel from 24 to 31 January 2007.
reviews.title: Fantastic 2 weeks

reviews.text: On arrival, my first impression was that this was a good hotel, by the time I left, that had changed to excellent (albeit the entertainment was poor).
reviews.title: fantastic

reviews.text: The rooms were cleaned on a daily basis, the food was fantastic and all the staff, especially the bar staff, were extremely nice and helpful.
reviews.title: grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrreeeeeat hotel

reviews.text: We have now visited Paphos on five occassions and non has disappointed.
reviews.title: Great animation team

reviews.text: Have just returned from a week at the Phaethon. The hotel saving grace was its staff who were absolutely superb - nothing was too much trouble for them and they would do their best to answer your request.
reviews.title: Great Staff save this hotel

reviews.text: The other reviews are spot on in that the food choice is great at meal times and there are a lot of facilities. However I would only return to this hotel if i had a young family as it was clear that the facilities were built for families - in fact when we were there, there were about 150 children staying there which meant that it was extremely difficult to use facilities such as the swimming pool, without getting hit on the head by a ball or inflatable! The entertainment in the nightclub at night was also swarming with children which when playing bingo got quite distracting.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel was also extremely close to the airport which none of the brochures mention - we mentioned this to our rep who said he had had no complaints - i just can't believe this as on turnover day (sun and weds) there is a plane flying over the hotel every 15 minutes or so. At night time this got quite disruptive and you couldnt sleep. Overall average hotel due to location and flight noise but if you are looking for a decent standard family hotel, then this is for you.
reviews.title: don't rush to book

reviews.text: This is a fantastic hotel if you've got kids. We've been twice and have booked for next year. I can't believe some of the negative remarks people have made . I do think some people will complain about anything. Alright so the rooms & the balcony are quite small but they are very clean and there's plenty of storage space. We personally dont go on holiday to stay in our rooms all day so the fact they are small is not an issue.
reviews.title: Noisy; Very Small Rooms And Balcony, Dirty

likes.liked: — It was extremly noisy and small and dirty

reviews.text: The food is great and yes they do repeat it on a weekly basis but so what. There's such a variety of food you don't have to have the same meal twice. It was always hot and plentiful.
reviews.title: Stop Moaning!!!

likes.liked: — The food and facilities for little kids

reviews.text: Just spent a week at the Phaethon pronounced firethon. We had two rooms as our boys are 13 and 10 so we had a bit more space as we knew they were small but they were clean and comfortable thanks to our maid who also replaced our towels every day.
reviews.title: Great family holiday

reviews.text: We didn't sit by the pool but chose to sit on the grass area under the trees next to the sea (there was no beach but we didn't care) where there was a nice breeze and plenty of shade. We took advantage of the water sports including the banana boat and jet ski's which cost extra.
reviews.title: Mind your step

reviews.text: Food was fantastic with everything you could wish for from pancake rolls to bread and butter pudding and custard! My 10 year old is the fussiest eater going and was kept very happy - the constant supply of ice cream helped.
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.text: The entertainment staff were brillaint and yes some of the evening shows were corny but they were done with such fun that we throroughly enjoyed them. We even played bingo a few nights and laughed the whole time.
reviews.title: Loved It

reviews.text: We sampled a different cocktail (or two) every night.
reviews.title: Great staff

reviews.text: A large party of us stayed at this hotel for 1 week on the 9th May. We came out for my brothers wedding. I'm not really a package holiday sort of person, but I had a really good holiday.
reviews.title: Great hotel overall

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel room was a good size, we had a ground floor room so we had a small terrace area outside. When we arrived there was a leak coming from the bathroom ceiling. After calling reception, this was fixed within 10 minutes. The people in the upstairs room had caused it apparently! Some people have commented on the condition of the towels, who cares! I don't come on holiday to have perfect towels! They were clean and replaced every day so I don't understand people who can complain about that! I also noticed on this site that people have complained about mosquitos - out of a party of 25, only 1 of us was bitten, and I'm sure its got nothing to do with the hotel. You are in a hot country, expect the odd mosquito!
reviews.title: Only really a 3 star***

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One of the best things about the hotel was the food. There was a big selection on offer, something for everyone. My dad is the fussiest eater but even he enjoyed it. The menu was different each day, so you could pile your plate up and try new things. There was also food available from the pool area all day which was good if you didn't want to go into the restaurant area for lunch. I expect most people put on some weight when staying here! There is a good selection of alcohol as well on the all inclusive, we enjoyed sampling all the cocktails!
reviews.title: Excellent Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a really good hotel for families, mainly down to the entertainment team, there were 5 children in our group and they loved taking part in the activities and the mini disco. The team also put on a show every night at 10pm for both adults and children, some nights where more entertaining then others.
reviews.title: MOZZIES ALL INCLUSIVE
Great overall
reviews.text: As for location, it is pretty good, you can walk into the harbour area in about 30/40 minutes but we usually caught the bus which took about 10 minutes and cost 70p. I wouldn't recommend taxis as the drivers are nuts!

description: Family-oriented Resort Hotel surrounded by beautiful gardens.
